responses: Hi there, how can I help?
See you later, thanks for visiting
Please refer to this URL to review accepted creative sizes.

patterns: Where can I login to Doubleclick Bid Manager
responses: Please refer to http://dbm.google.com to login

patterns: Do I have access to the custom audience tool?
Is the custom audience tool enabled for my company?
responses: Please visit mightdesk.mightyhive.com/company and click on the CAT button.
You should have access to CAT in MightyDesk. If you are having issues logging in, please reach out to your Account Manager.

patterns: How does the custom audience tool work?
responses: Cat is a first-party data uploader for targeting your CRM audiences in DBM.
The custom audience tool (CAT) uses your first-party data to target browser cookies.
Using CAT is simple, just upload a CSV of your user data and within a few days you will be able to target this audience in DBM.
